channel.title: Comments on: Interview with Brent Ozar about the book Professional SQL Server 2008 Internals and Troubleshooting
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.content:encoded:
Leave it to Brent to dig where no man as gone digging before ðŸ˜‰

Great book Brent and great interview Denis. I enjoy these very much.

item.title: By: James Cornell
item.dc:creator: James Cornell
item.content:encoded:
Great interview Denis.

I am still reading through the book but love that it digs into areas that are usually not covered in SQL Server books.
